p: The MIC values obtained for the DCM : MeOH extract of C. asiatica against Salmonella typhi and Escherichia coli were significantly higher compared to those against S. aureus ( p < 0.05; Table 2). The MIC values of the extract against S. sonnei, B. subtilis, and S. aureus were not significantly different from each other ( p < 0.05; Table 2). The MBC values obtained for the extract against Salmonella typhi and E. coli were not significantly different from each other, but were significantly higher than the MBC obtained for Staphylococcus aureus, Shigella sonnei, and B. subtilis ( p < 0.05; Table 2).
